reviewText: This Reading Rainbow product is a delight to children of all ages.  I purchased this for my Grandchildren and my daughter immediately was sharing with them her time of watching the same stories on TV when she was growing up.  The concept of sharing the story and information related to a story encourages learning, reading, and childhood curiousity.
My students and I love Reading Rainbow
DVD really poor quality... Skips around and stops often
We love all Reading Rainbow Books.
I love this reading rainbow! It is perfect for spring and my students LOVE the "I'm breaking out". Song!
one of my favorite shows when i was young. it was great then and great now. i hope it comes back
Over all, all the Reading Rainbow are just great. My Grandson and his friends just watch them over and over. Each time he watches on of the videos he learns something new

These Reading Rainbow DVDs allow the legacy of this great show to live on. Most of the books my children read now were reviewed on the show over twenty years ago. Several of the books have been turned into movies, the caliber of the books and their authors is evident. i would suggest anyone who want to encourage literate kids to watch these videos. We watch the video then go get the books from the library or buy them from Amazon.
Very nice DVD showed a lot about chickens that was useful for a pre-K chicken unit
